texts.name: Caballero
texts.biography: Caballero is a gnoll and used to be a guard who belonged to King Tarossik. After a failure assassination he was banished to a board village. In this place he experienced invasion of undead and suffered from plague and disaster. Now he becomes a member of church and starts a new life.

specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Slayers and Executioners by 1 and their Attack and defense skills by 5% for every 2 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Slayers
